== Introduction ==

'''Siril''' that is meant to be Iris for Linux (sirI-L), is a powerful astrophotographic image processing application. 

== Installation ==

=== Standard ===

<nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware|Install]]</nowiki> the following package: <nowiki>[[apt:--siril | siril]]</nowiki>.<<BR>>

=== From external PPA ===

The latest version of Siril could not be available in the default Ubuntu repositories. To install it, add the '''ppa:lock042/siril''' repository, through the '''Software & Updates''' app or via the command line:
<pre>
sudo apt-add-repository ppa:lock042/siril
</pre>

<<BR>>
